Source: Tornadoes data set Kaggle 

Data: All tornado reports for the contiguous US from 1950 to 2021

Description: A brief description of this data set is the amount of tornadoes in the United States from 1950 to 2021. And the data accounts for the amount of damage, fatalities, losses, tornado size, width, and intesity.

Citation: Mb. “Tornadoes Dataset.” Kaggle, 28 Oct. 2022, www.kaggle.com/datasets/michaelbryantds/tornadoes. 

yr: Year

mo: Month

dy: Day

date: Date

tz: Time zone

st: State

stf: State FIPS Number

stn: State number

f: F-Scale

inj: Injuries

fat: Fatalities

loss: Loss

len: Length

wid: Width

elat: Ending Longitude

elong:Ending Latitude
